context: Youâ€™re looking at a forward-facing dash-cam view from a car stopped behind a parked vehicle on a dimly lit urban street at night.
perception: The street is a two-lane road with one lane in each direction, marked by double yellow lines in the center. There is a red traffic light visible further down the road, indicating a stop signal for vehicles traveling in this direction. prediction: The traffic light ahead will remain red for a short period, requiring vehicles to stop. The parked car ahead will remain stationary. Other vehicles behind or approaching the intersection may also stop.
planning: Remain stopped behind the parked vehicle and prepare to stop fully at the red traffic light ahead. Do not attempt to pass the parked car due to the narrow lane and oncoming traffic lane. Wait for the light to turn green before proceeding.
